text: I really appreciate Deck Masters and would definitely use them again. At every stage they were friendly, easy to reach, professional and dependable. I had a general idea of what I wanted and they offered some additional suggestions, and I ended up with front and back decks that I love, and my friends and neighbors do, too. They kept me informed at every stage and always gave me at least a week’s advance notice before starting any work. Really great company, wonderful people to work with.
author: Shelly Wells
